item.title: Arc Raider is "committed to skill and fun, not unfair advantages" and is refunding gear lost to cheaters - even if you didn't report them - Eurogamer
item.description:
1. Arc Raider is "committed to skill and fun, not unfair advantages" and is refunding gear lost to cheaters - even if you didn't report them  Eurogamer
  2. ARC Raiders compensates victims of loot-stealing cheaters — "if you encounter cheaters or unfair play, Embark will refund your items to your inventory"  Windows Central
  3. Arc Raiders Will Give You Your Items Back If They're Stolen By Hackers Or Lost In "Unfair Play"  TheGamer
  4. ARC Raiders Will Refund Gear Lost to Cheaters, Even If You Didn’t Report Them  GamingBolt
  5. Embark returns items stolen by cheaters in Arc Raiders  TweakTown
